ValueSet-SGPersonaTypesVS.description: JSON Schema for Smart Guidelines Persona Types Value Set ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-SGPersonaTypesVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the Smart Guidelines Persona Types Value Set ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/base/ValueSet-SGPersonaTypesVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
